alert.note: Alert for Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Harris; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 4:46PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fort Bend, north central Brazoria, southeastern Waller and central Harris Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 445 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Katy to Briar Forest to Memorial Park. Movement was southwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Pearland, Sugar Land, Missouri City, Rosenberg, Stafford, Bellaire, West University Place, Katy, Richmond, Hunters Creek Village, Bunker Hill Village, Piney Point Village, Midtown Houston, southern Northside / Northline, Greenway / Upper Kirby Area, Spring Branch North, Greater Heights, Fresno, Mission Bend and Neartown / Montrose. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Fort Bend; Inland Brazoria; Inland Harris; Waller
